channel.title: Pasta on Math Life
channel.description: Recent content in Pasta on Math Life

item.title: Pasta verde
item.description: After a fair number of iterations this is the result my cooking pasta with greens. At home we just call it Pasta Verde. 1 Start by peeling and cutting up into small cubes three medium size potatoes 2 Cut off the stems from the Swiss chard (I also added some leaves from a local variety) 3 Heat a medium size pan (7.5/10 in my induction stove) and put in the potatoes.
